turkish_example_sentence: Siz bu önemli toplantıda söylenen her sözü dikkatle duyarsınız.
english_example_sentence: You carefully hear every word spoken in this important meeting.
russian_example_sentence: Вы внимательно слышите каждое слово, сказанное на этой важной встрече.
